description:
Have you ever had an unexpected guest pleasantly surprise you? Tonight on Good News we have a listener story to share, and you will never guess who walked delightfully through their door. Find out who surprised this listener on The Current on Monday, June 24,  just after 8 p.m. CDT.

And share your stories of how music has influenced you for the better or inspired an act of positivity at ajaffer@mpr.org

Support The Current:
https://support.mpr.org/youtube

title: Good News: an unexpected visitor #thecurrent #musicstories #shorts
